thread.title: Ruslaan Mumtaz And Nirali Mehta's Holiday Pictures Will Make You Want To Head Out Too
thread.title_full: Ruslaan Mumtaz And Nirali Mehta's Holiday Pictures Will Make You Want To Head Out Too

title: Ruslaan Mumtaz And Nirali Mehta's Holiday Pictures Will Make You Want To Head Out Too
text:
facebook 176 SHARES 
Bollywood actor and T.V. star Ruslaan Mumtaz and wife, Nirali Mehta, are holidaying in Mauritius and the pictures are amazing. Everything from the picturesque location to the so in love couple will make you want to plan your own holiday. A post shared by Ruslaan Mumtaz (@ruslaanmumtaz) on Feb 21, 2017 at 9:29pm PST A post shared by Ruslaan Mumtaz (@ruslaanmumtaz) on Feb 20, 2017 at 12:10am PST A post shared by Ruslaan Mumtaz (@ruslaanmumtaz) on Feb 18, 2017 at 10:46pm PST A post shared by Ruslaan Mumtaz (@ruslaanmumtaz) on Feb 16, 2017 at 7:39pm PST A post shared by Ruslaan Mumtaz (@ruslaanmumtaz) on Feb 14, 2017 at 9:26am PST A post shared by Nirali M (@niralirm) on Feb 22, 2017 at 9:13pm PST A post shared by Nirali M (@niralirm) on Feb 21, 2017 at 9:32pm PST A post shared by Nirali M (@niralirm) on Feb 19, 2017 at 11:37pm PST A post shared by Nirali M (@niralirm) on Feb 18, 2017 at 8:15pm PST
